Employee Demo

Entity Model

Mappings

The JPA mappings are defined using annotations as well as eclipselink-orm.xml. The default configuration of the demo application will only use the annotations while the XML is provided for those who prefer to configure their mappings this way.

Features

This example application demonstrates several features of EclipseLink JPA including:
  • Basic mapping and extended mappings: Converter
  • Querying: Pagination
  • Multi-tenancy: Application users only see entities from their company
